
waterpolo exploration
making graphs 
group by
totals 
234 
outliers


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ncaa_waterpolo <- read_csv("ncaa_waterpolo.csv")
```

```{r}
ncaa_waterpolo %>% group_by(Team) %>%
  summarize(
    sum = sum(Goals)
  )
```

```{r}
ncaa_waterpolo %>% group_by(Team) %>%
  ggplot(.,
         mapping = aes(x = Goals,
                       fill = Conference
                       )) +
  geom_boxplot()
```

```{r}
ncaa_waterpolo %>% group_by(Conference) %>%
  ggplot(.,
         mapping = aes(x = Goals,
                       fill = Conference
                       )) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
